title: DAAST Asset Type Schema
description: Schema for DAAST (Digital Audio Ad Serving Template) XML tags for third-party audio ad serving

asset_id.description: Unique identifier for this asset within the format

required.description: Whether this asset is mandatory for the format

url.description: URL endpoint that returns DAAST XML response

content.description: Inline DAAST XML content (alternative to url)

exact_seconds.description: Exact required duration in seconds (if applicable)

required_events.description: Tracking events that must be supported

optional_events.description: Additional tracking events that may be supported

companion_ads.description: Requirements for companion display ads that may accompany the DAAST audio ad. This specifies format requirements, not the actual companion ad assets (which should be separate image assets in the format).

required.description: Whether companion ads must be included with this DAAST tag

accepted_dimensions.description: List of accepted companion ad dimensions (e.g., [{width: 300, height: 250}]). Actual companion ad assets should be provided as separate image assets in the creative manifest.

fallback_required.description: Whether a fallback audio asset must be provided if DAAST tag fails to load or render. When true, the format specification should include a separate audio asset (asset_type: 'audio') to use as fallback.

supported_macros.description: List of universal macros supported by this DAAST tag (e.g., CACHEBUSTER, CLICK_URL)

required_macros.description: List of universal macros that must be provided for DAAST tag to function
